item.title: Started MSc in ML
item.description:
Started MSc in ML at AMMI

African Masterâ€™s in Machine Intelligence (AMMI) is a novel fully funded one-year intensive graduate program that provides brilliant young Africans with state-of-the-art training in machine learning and its applications. The program is sponsored by Meta and Google.
The program provides cutting-edge machine learning education taught by world-class AI experts from around the globe, ensuring students receive top-tier instruction comparable to leading international program
